resources.string: Choose the number that is higher.\nQuestions can be repeated until you get 20 points.

"Congratulations, the level is completed!\n Did you know that the number 7 is considered the luckiest number? There are 7 days in a week, 7 continents, 7 colors of the rainbow, 7 musical notes and much more. Also, the number 7 is the favorite number of most people in the world."
Choose the Roman numeral that is greater.\nQuestions can be repeated until you get 20 points.
"Congratulations, the level is completed!\n Did you know that there is no zero in Roman numerals?"
Choose the fraction that is larger.\nQuestions can be repeated until you reach 20 points.
"Congratulations, the level has been completed!\n Operations with fractions in the Middle Ages were considered the most difficult area of mathematics."
Choose something edible.\nQuestions can be repeated until you get 20 points.
"Congratulations, the level is completed!\n Many crocodiles swallow stones. But not because they find them edible. Stones help them dive faster into the water and stay on the bottom."
